AI_QUALITY_FAILURES.reasoning: ATLAS provided incorrect/misleading product compatibility guidance (stating NG110 is not supported for 9.5.0) which the customer later disproved by successfully installing 9.5.0. This directly harmed customer trust and delayed resolution. ATLAS also initially offered speculative causes (disk space/corrupt download/hardware incompatibility) without concrete diagnostic steps or logs available on the appliance, and did not provide a clear path to obtain the missing Patch 2 image that the customer needed.

ATLAS: "As of the latest available information, the Kerio Control Box NG110 series is not supported for Kerio Control version 9.5.0 or later."

Customer: "Zebra Systems... claimed that informations given by your support (AI - below in this conversation) are totally wrong. Version 9.5.0 IS supported on NG110 units and CAN be installed... it is working !"
Customer: "...upgrade IS offered by GFI for installation on NG110 unit, but upgrade is failing. There is no new (patch 2) image on download page available so we cannot try it."

evidence: Customer: "Please pass this ticket to human."

Customer: "There is no new (patch 2) image on download page available so we cannot try it."
ATLAS: "Manual Upgrade Attempt... manually download the 9.4.5 Patch 2 firmware from the official Kerio archive..." (customer later indicates that patch image is not available)
